description: Zetas la Calera is a mushroom cultivation initiative founded by two sisters, who sought an economic alternative to their previous jobs. With support from Huella, they have developed a sustainable business model that focuses on organic mushroom production. By utilizing specialized indoor growing techniques, they aim to supply mushrooms year-round, catering to the growing demand for organic products in the culinary market while navigating challenges in sourcing materials and expanding their operations.
name: Zetas la Calera
